pullrequest.title: Overload SetupClient() and SetupServer() with std::vector<std::string>

content.raw:
Thanks, that makes sense. That wasn't clear to me before. 

The description you just gave would be nearly perfect if you could put it directly in the doxygen comments. That plus a reference to where in the API a plugin can parse those arguments would be a fantastic improvement to the doxygen docs for these functions. :-)
content.html:
